document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2020-04
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON TO AMEND THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE CHAPTER 19.39 "ACCESSORY DWELLING UNITS" AND CHAPTER 19.10.040 "RESIDENTIAL DISTRICTS PERMITTED USE TABLE" CONSISTENT WITH CURRENT STATE LAW
